title: Scotland: land of legends
creator_credit: International Video Network, Susan Templin, Peter May and Chip Duncan
brief_description: Narrated by John McIlwraith this video provides the viewer with an armchair guide of Scotland, land of legends. Explore the history of golf, visit Glasgow, the Barras, the rugged landscape of the Hebrides, Aberdeen, the River Tweed, Glenfiddich Distillery, Loch Ness, Urquhart Castle, and Dryburgh Abbey, resting place of Sir Walter Scott.
